name: Bubble Pop World
synopsis: Bubble Pop World is a 3D match-three game in which you pop bubbles with the same colors. It is based on Augmented Reality technology, so the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢ AR Card is required. There are 120 puzzle and arcade levels to enjoy, or you can edit more of your own levels and share them with friends via QR Codes. In Arcade Mode you also travel around the world to discover undersea mini-games. Game features: AR card based match-three puzzle game 120 Puzzle and Arcade levels Edit up to 128 of your own levels and share with friends Discover the world in 8 underwater mini-games Unlockable trophies Hours of gameplay and replay value
